summary: This is a guide to installing a set of mods that will provide what is so far the best exprience in graphics and immersion that is available through mods. At the moment, there is no downloadable file for this, but a step by step guide, with links, to installing the mods you need to get a good looking Skyrim experience.
descriptionHtml:
Version Update v1.1:

This is version 1.1 released on 5-December-2011. It includes a download with some of the larger mods in the compilation. I have full permission from the creators of these files to include them in this compilation, with other permission pending or on hold till mods are ready. Please, follow the steps below.

[b]Step 1: [/b][url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=131]FXAA Injector: Install Preset 1[/url]
[b]Step 2: [/b][url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=823]Immersive Environment FXAA[/url]
[b]Step 3: [/b][url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=822]Skyrim Enhanced Shaders[/url] [b]Permission pending as Mod subject to rapid development.[/b]
[b]Step 4: [/b][url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=607]Skyrim HD[/url]
[b]Step 5: [/b][url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1598]Enhanced Distant Terrain[/url]
[b]Step 6: [/b][url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=141]Vurts Flora Overhaul(Groundcover Optional)[/url] [b]Permission temporarily refused as mod subject to rapid change.[/b]
[b]Step 7: [/b] Download this compilation mod and put its contents into your MAIN Skyrim folder.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

There are a large number of files to download and install, so, settle in and get a cup of tea and a crumpet. I will take this step by step, providing a link to EACH mod that you need to install in a given step. This is version 1.0 and is subject to change. I will try my best to keep this up to date.

This is as far as I have gotten so far for the visual enhancement. Let me know what you think and let me know if I should add anything. I hope this is helpful to you all, I will keep updating as I can.
author: Sansha and Various Authors
